quotes: January 2014 marked yet another transition, as Podesta returned to the White House to serve under President Obama as a senior advisor.
In February 2015, Podesta left the White House to chair Hillary Clinton's PAC, Hillary for America, the official Hillary Clinton 2016 presidential campaign.
In an April 2016 piece in Time, the magazine outlined Podesta's role in Clinton's campaign
In May 2016, Podesta issued a press release concerning the investigations into Clinton's use of a private email server

time_markers.text: final three years of the administration
quotes: Podesta's hiring, according to Politico, signaled a shift in the Obama White House toward a 'more aggressive focus...on using executive authority to circumvent Congress in the final three years of the administration.'

organizations.name: White House
quotes: Podesta returned to the White House to serve under President Obama as a senior advisor.

organizations.name: CAP
quotes: However, Podesta's position at the White House brought into question whether his policy decisions would reflect the needs of major CAP donors;

organizations.name: Hillary for America
quotes: In February 2015, Podesta left the White House to chair Hillary Clinton's PAC, Hillary for America, the official Hillary Clinton 2016 presidential campaign.

organizations.name: Hillary Clinton 2016 presidential campaign
quotes: In February 2015, Podesta left the White House to chair Hillary Clinton's PAC, Hillary for America, the official Hillary Clinton 2016 presidential campaign.

organizations.name: New York Times
quotes: The New York Times argued that Podesta's presence would 'impose a more orderly structure' on the campaign, in contrast to Clinton's disorganized 2008 presidential bid.

organizations.name: Politico
quotes: Politico described Podesta as the 'adult in the room.' Moreover, they argued that he would 'help integrate longtime Clinton allies and newer former Obama staffers' into Clinton's campaign.

organizations.name: Time
quotes: In an April 2016 piece in Time, the magazine outlined Podesta's role in Clinton's campaign

roles.title: chairman of the campaign
quotes: As chairman of the campaign, Podesta is active in fundraising, strategy, and staff management.

roles.title: part coach, part gatekeeper, judge and jury, director, fundraiser, policy wonk and strategist
quotes: And it has been Podesta— part coach, part gatekeeper, judge and jury, director, fundraiser, policy wonk and strategist—who has overseen the Clinton effort.
Podesta returned to the White House to serve under President Obama as a senior advisor.
